incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio assistant services. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Call Failures From and To Multiple Networks in Chile via Subset of Twilio Chile Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in Chile via a subset of Twilio phone numbers. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays and call failures from and to multiple networks in Chile via a subset of Twilio Chile phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays and call failures from and to multiple networks in Chile via a subset of Twilio Chile phone numbers. We have identified the incident in relation with nationwide Power outage in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays and call failures from and to multiple networks in Chile via a subset of Twilio Chile phone numbers. We have identified the incident in relation with nationwide Power outage in Chile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays and call failures from and  to multiple networks in Chile via a subset of Twilio Chile phone numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays and call failures from and  to multiple networks in Chile via a subset of Twilio Chile phone numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Flex and Task Router Workers Experiencing Issues Handling Tasks

incident_updates.body: On February 19th, from approximately 9:00 AM to 9:10 AM and 12:00 PM to 12:26 PM PST, we experienced issues with Flex and Task Router. Customers may have noticed increased latency as well as Agents having issues accepting or interacting with Tasks and Invites. This issue has been mitigated.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex Notification Platform. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
